svg.title: ABC Foundation Status ‚Äî What's Built vs. What's Needed

g.text: v1.0 Boolean Classification Engine ‚Äî Implementation Audit
5 categories: in-depth, opinion, live, explainer, multimedia
Full path tracking ‚Ä¢ Human-readable ‚Ä¢ Compact encoded format
Schema exists but not validated at runtime
No tracking of counts, latency, accuracy
Manual context object creation by caller
‚Ä¢ 7 test cases | Console output | Manual pass/fail
ABC Foundation Status v1.0 ‚Ä¢ src/analysis/decisionTreeEngine.js ‚Ä¢ November 2025
